note.p: Daughter of Peter Holland, doctor of Knutsford, and his second wife Mary Whittaker. Half-sister of Henry, Mary, Bessy and Lucy Holland. Cousin of E. C. Gaskell. Married Richard Timothy Deane as his second wife in 1844.
ensus returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/92/17/28)
Cheshire, England, select bishop’s transcripts, 1576–1933 (Ancestry.com, accessed 13 June 2017)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 13 June 2017)
